data.name: RPGScenery - Lake Scene
data.detailed_description:
The valley at the foot of the pine-covered mountains is filled with azure glitter by a huge lake as far as you can see. Instead of cliffs, the lake is bordered by a flat, pebble shore in places. These clearings are connected by thin roads winding between the pine forests. On the largest clearing stands an old ruin, part of which has already been flooded.

This DLC contains 8 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
